metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5972 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A null pointer dereference flaw was found in the nft_inner.c functionality of netfilter in the Linux kernel. This issue could allow a local user to crash the system or escalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-signed package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-signed-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-signed-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
